title: Fintech insurance startup Lemonade just filed for an IPO
text:
With a $2.1 billion estimated valuation, fintech insurer Lemonade may be the next unicorn as it files its IPO.
Lemonade, a startup that sells insurance to renters and homeowners (not to be confused with the Beyonce album and film), filed for an IPO on the New York Stock Exchange today, estimating it will raise about $100 million.
